name: voby-demo
description: A high-performance framework with fine-grained observable-based reactivity for building rich applications.

scripts.dev:benchmark: cd demo/benchmark && pnpm i && pnpm update && pnpm run dev
scripts.prod:benchmark: cd demo/benchmark && pnpm i && pnpm update && pnpm run prod
scripts.dev:boxes: cd demo/boxes && pnpm i && pnpm update && pnpm run dev
scripts.prod:boxes: cd demo/boxes && pnpm i && pnpm update && pnpm run prod
scripts.dev:clock: cd demo/clock && pnpm i && pnpm update && pnpm run dev
scripts.prod:clock: cd demo/clock && pnpm i && pnpm update && pnpm run prod
scripts.dev:counter: cd demo/counter && pnpm i && pnpm update && pnpm run dev
scripts.prod:counter: cd demo/counter && pnpm i && pnpm update && pnpm run prod
scripts.dev:emoji_counter: cd demo/emoji_counter && pnpm i && pnpm update && pnpm run dev
scripts.prod:emoji_counter: cd demo/emoji_counter && pnpm i && pnpm update && pnpm run prod
scripts.dev:html: cd demo/html && pnpm i && pnpm update && pnpm run dev
scripts.prod:html: cd demo/html && pnpm i && pnpm update && pnpm run prod
scripts.dev:hyperscript: cd demo/hyperscript && pnpm i && pnpm update && pnpm run dev
scripts.prod:hyperscript: cd demo/hyperscript && pnpm i && pnpm update && pnpm run prod
scripts.dev:playground: cd demo/playground && pnpm i && pnpm update && pnpm run dev
scripts.prod:playground: cd demo/playground && pnpm i && pnpm update && pnpm run prod
scripts.dev:spiral: cd demo/spiral && pnpm i && pnpm update && pnpm run dev
scripts.prod:spiral: cd demo/spiral && pnpm i && pnpm update && pnpm run prod
scripts.dev:store_counter: cd demo/store_counter && pnpm i && pnpm update && pnpm run dev
scripts.prod:store_counter: cd demo/store_counter && pnpm i && pnpm update && pnpm run prod
scripts.dev:triangle: cd demo/triangle && pnpm i && pnpm update && pnpm run dev
scripts.prod:triangle: cd demo/triangle && pnpm i && pnpm update && pnpm run prod
scripts.dev:uibench: cd demo/uibench && pnpm i && pnpm update && pnpm run dev
scripts.prod:uibench: cd demo/uibench && pnpm i && pnpm update && pnpm run prod
scripts.prepublishOnly: pnpm run clean && pnpm run compile
scripts.clean:nm: for /d /r . %d in (node_modules) do @if exist "%d" (echo Removing "%d" & rd /s /q "%d")
scripts.bump: pnpm version patch && pnpm version patch -w demo/**
